title: Divine Vaagai Haaram: Polki Diamond & Gemstone Necklace
materials: Crafted in 22K Gold with a Hyderabadi Polish for a rich lustre. Features Polki Diamonds with a Rose Cut and carefully selected Rubies and Emeralds. Diamond Clarity: VS-SI.
features: This exquisite three-layer Haaram features a delicate Vaagai (banyan leaf) design, each leaf intricately set with Polki diamonds. The necklace incorporates floral motifs adorned with centrally placed Rubies and Emeralds, adding a touch of color and elegance. The final pendant, studded with diamonds, culminates in dangling gold beads, creating a mesmerizing sway with every movement. Features a timeless and intricate design.
colors: Predominantly gold with the brilliance of Polki diamonds
accented by the vibrant hues of Ruby red and Emerald green.
occasions: and other significant celebrations. Also suitable for high-end social gatherings and cultural events.
description: A beautiful amalgamation of traditional South Indian design and modern aesthetics, this Haaram is a statement piece that exudes grace and heritage. The intricate detailing and the use of high-quality Polki diamonds and vibrant gemstones make it a valuable addition to any jewelry collection. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting shine, while the timeless design guarantees that it will be cherished for generations. Experience the true essence of Telugu craftsmanship.
